item.description:
I have been craving some savory Indian food. According to Connecticut Magazine, this restaurant is a must! I know that most of our dinners start at 7pm but I am starving by then. Hopefully, 6:30pm will work for some of you. If not, I can change it to 7pm. I've read some reviews for this place and it seems to be a favorite for many. I will call ahead for a reservation the day before the event and the table will be under my name.
Organizer ~ Kelly

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Taj Mahal in Vernon
